tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor listens to our problem patiently,he won't jump to conclusions immediately,after examinining the condition through diagnostic tests only suggests the treatment. I suffered a lot with toothache,root canal was suggested and now in final stage of the treatment. He is very friendly and available over phone and messages. I strongly recommend to approach him for dental problems.
